mapper.select: select elders_id, name, age, birth_date, ethnicity, account, password, education, marital_status, hobbies, care_level, medical_care, fee_type, expenses, relative_contact, bed_number, check_in_date, check_out_date, created_at, updated_at from elders order by updated_at desc
SELECT * FROM elders WHERE elders_id NOT IN (SELECT elders_id FROM beds WHERE elders_id IS NOT NULL)
mapper.insert: insert into elders(name, age, birth_date, ethnicity, account, password, education, marital_status, hobbies, care_level, medical_care, fee_type, expenses, relative_contact, bed_number, check_in_date, check_out_date, created_at, updated_at) values (#{name}, #{age}, #{birthDate}, #{ethnicity}, #{account}, #{password}, #{education}, #{maritalStatus}, #{hobbies}, #{careLevel}, #{medicalCare}, #{feeType}, #{expenses}, #{relativeContact}, #{bedNumber}, #{checkInDate}, #{checkOutDate}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: select elders_id, name, age, birth_date, ethnicity, account, password, education, marital_status, hobbies, care_level, medical_care, fee_type, expenses, relative_contact, bed_number, check_in_date, check_out_date, created_at, updated_at from elders where elders_id = #{id}
